root.name: loadShape()
root.description:
Loads geometry into a variable of type PShape. SVG and OBJ files may be loaded. To load correctly, the file must be located in the data directory of the current sketch. In most cases, loadShape() should be used inside setup() because loading shapes inside draw() will reduce the speed of a sketch. The filename parameter can also be a URL to a file hosted online. OBJ files may only be loaded in programs that use the P3D renderer (e.g. size(800, 600, P3D).

If a shape is not loaded successfully, the null value is returned and an error message will be printed to the console. The error message does not halt the program, however the null value may cause a NullPointerException if your code does not check whether the value returned from loadShape() is null.
